channel.title: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
channel.description:
WASHINGTON — The United States has discovered nearly [size=36pt]$1 trillion[/size] in untapped mineral deposits in Afghanistan, far beyond any previously known reserves and enough to fundamentally alter the Afghan economy and perhaps the Afghan war itself, according to senior American government officials.
Article: http://www.nytimes.com/2010/06/14/world/asia/14minerals.html

item.title: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:48, topic:344105”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=440484.msg3239477#msg3239477 date=1276794275]

which was the case in deposing saddam hussein who killed thousands of people because they didn’t agree with him.

So you correct this by… killing thousands of people who don’t agree with you?
[/quote]

The people saddam killed were innocent, the people we killed were the people who killed the innocent people.

That’s like saying that invading germany and killing nazis was wrong even though they killed jews.[/quote]

Had Germany won that war, than yes, it would have been ‘wrong’. Same goes for the current wars. If Iraq or Afghanistan somehow turned the tables on us and won the war then America would be wrong, not them.

After all, innocence is chosen by the victorious.

Read full topic
item.source: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan

item.title: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The_Flames:

The US didn’t mind Saddam when he was fighting against Iran with chemical weapons, I heard the US voted against sanctioning Iraq at the time despite chemical weapons obviously being war crimes and crimes against humanity.

Until he secretly led his army into Kuwait to try to take control of the worlds oil supply, and he had the missiles we gave him at the time IRRC.

We supported Saddam because he kept Iran in check, so we wouldn’t have to send our military over to fight Iran.

Read full topic

item.title: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Lothy:

You can’t argue with someone that has completely liberal sensibilities.

So true.

And yes, the longer the resistance and other factions resist, the longer we’re there. We’re not trying to completely override their government, just get elections in place and make the country safe again for when we leave, which is why we are training their military.

Its funny because people say that we were never wanted there, but when we helped support and protect the Iraqi Tribunal they voted to execute Saddam.

Read full topic

item.title: U.S. Identifies Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Wouldn’t bother Frell. I pointed that out on IRC the other night, among other things, and I just ended up receiving a zline. You can’t argue with someone that has completely liberal sensibilities.
I agree with you though. If everyone in the Iraq region just kept their mouths shut and did let the western forces do what they’re trying to do, we would be gone by now.
